Cancer: I would cure cancer first because it is a deadly disease that affects millions of people worldwide. It would bring immense relief to those who suffer from it and their families.
Malaria: Malaria is a disease that affects millions of people in Africa, Asia, and South America. It is a preventable disease, and curing it would have a significant impact on global health.
Infectious diseases: I would cure infectious diseases like tuberculosis, HIV/AIDS, and hepatitis. These diseases have a high mortality rate and affect millions of people worldwide.

Mental health disorders: I would cure mental health disorders like depression, anxiety, and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). These disorders affect millions of people worldwide and can lead to suicide, substance abuse, and other mental health issues.

Chronic pain: I would cure chronic pain conditions like arthritis, fibromyalgia, and chronic migraines. These conditions affect millions of people worldwide and can significantly impact their quality of life.
